Final acceptance is determined solely by the service academies. Our service academies are distinguished by a devotion to honor, courage and commitment. I am honored to nominate these young, talented New Yorkers who exemplify these core values. It is my hope that these accomplished nominees have the chance to live their dreams and serve in our country's armed forces with distinction, Kirsten Gillibrand said.
